item.title: Report E-2024080373
item.description:
Report E-2024080373

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-13
  • City: CONLEY
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ROADRUNNER TRANSPORTATION SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 13, 2024, at 2050 ET, Emergency Response and Training Solutions (ERTS) was contacted by Roadrunner personnel in Conley, Georgia regarding the release of Socar Brake Wash (UN1208, Hexanes, 3, II). Contractors were dispatched to the site to perform all onsite clean-up activities. Upon arrival, contractors confirmed the release of 20 gallons of Socar Brake Wash (UN1208, Hexanes, 3, II) from (1) 55-gallon DM. The release was caused by a forklift puncture and impacted a 15ft x 20ft area of concrete on the dock floor. Contractors reported that the release had completely evaporated by the time they arrived. Contractors placed the damaged drum with the remaining product into a 65-gallon metal overpack then staged the waste onsite for proper disposal.
